document_data.title: The Sea of Screams
document_data.author: [[Rick Swan]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''"The Sea of Screams"''' is an adventure module for beginner players set in [[the Abyss]], where the players must accompany [[Gustofsen Eller]], a [[cleric]], in his mission to verify whether he has succeeded in slaying the goddess [[Kali]].
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: The adventurers must protect the [[cleric]] [[Gustofsen Eller]], who believes he has slain [[Kali]], in a trip to her layer of the [[Abyss]]. Only by looking for her dead body can he be completely certain that he has succeeded in killing her.
